metadata.Title: CVE-2017-14120 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
unrar 0.0.1 (aka unrar-free or unrar-gpl) suffers from a directory traversal vulnerability for RAR v2 archives: pathnames of the form ../[filename] are unpacked into the upper directory.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-14120` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

unrar-free - 1:0.0.1+cvs20140707-4~build0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: unrar-free package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:0.0.1+cvs20140707-4~build0.16.04.1').
